question:

Input: Getting an Avocado Plant Started remove and wash the pit. Suspend the pit in water. Place in the refrigerator, and change the water weekly. When the stem is about six inches long, cut it back. Plant your avocado pit. Water the plant frequently.Harden off the avocado plant. Pinch the leaves off after every six inches of growth.
Output:
answer: Getting an Avocado Plant Started remove and wash the pit. Suspend the pit in water.Place by a sunny window and replace water as needed. When the stem is about six inches long, cut it back. Plant your avocado pit. Water the plant frequently.Harden off the avocado plant. Pinch the leaves off after every six inches of growth.
